title: How do I import contacts from or export contacts to a SIM card?
answer:
*   Exporting contacts from your your phone to a SIM card


1.  1.  Touch Contacts > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76673) > Import/Export > Export to SIM card. 



> 

> ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76674)

> >

> 2. Select the contacts you want to export and touch EXPORT then OK.

> >

> 

> ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76675)

*   Importing contacts from a SIM card


1.  1.  Touch Contacts > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76676) > Import/Export > Import from SIM card.  



> 

> ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76677)

> >

> 2. Select the contacts you want to import and touch IMPORT then Phone.
